620820.name: Kronos - Wisdom Trials
620820.description:
Every Nightingale must pass this trials to become a true alchemist. A master of the elements.

Test your mind with the most difficult puzzles in the game. Only with logic, skill and intelligence you will succeded.

  • Around 2 hours of gameplay.
  • New zone with 6 new maps.
  • Hard logic puzzles. Solutions change every new game.
  • The Beholder, a new enemy with lethal sight.
  • Face your true self and defeat the Judge of the Trials.

Can you solve the hardest puzzles in the Wisdom Trials?
620820.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
